subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Bill Werber steered his motorized wheelchair to the end of the table. The waitress pointed to the lunch menu, but Werber, the oldest living former major league baseball player, had no use for it.
snippet: Bill Werber steered his motorized wheelchair to the end of the table. The waitress pointed to the lunch menu, but Werber, the oldest living former major league baseball player, had no use for it.
